abstract: Microsoft had to pull the plug on its online Santa after the animated elf responded to children’s queries with lewd remarks.
snippet: Microsoft had to pull the plug on its online Santa after the animated elf responded to children’s queries with lewd remarks.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft says its engineers have persuaded Santa Claus to stop talking dirty, but they still don’t trust the big guy to keep it clean when speaking with children, so he is no longer allowed on Windows Live Messenger.

headline.main: This Time, Santa Has Been Too Naughty
headline.print_headline: This Time, Santa Has Been Too Naughty
